alert.note: Alert for Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 01 at 9:37PM AKST until January 02 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Prince of Wales Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Loose objects may blow be blown around. Winds may blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Peak winds up to 70 mph continue to be observed at the Hydaburg Seaplane Base. Very windy conditions are now expected to continue through the night and should start diminishing by late tonight. Highest winds expected along the southern part of Prince of Wales Island, especially near Hydaburg.
info.instruction: A high wind warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring.
